How to use our website

First time

Install q in order to run SQL directly on TSV files:

$ sudo apt update
$ sudo apt install python3-q-text-as-data

Clone the GitHub repository:

$ git clone https://github.com/ryan-broguiere/cpsc349-project1.git

Download the Unsplash Lite dataset and extract some pet photos:

$ cd cpsc349-project/unsplash
$ make

Install and start the Eleventy static site generator:

$ cd .. or cd-
$ npm install
$ npm start

Open the newly generated site.

Regular Use

'cd' into the "cpsc349-project1" directory and use the command 'npm start'

Localhost Website Link
